article_title: Connecticut Tribes Open to Cooperation on a Casino
article_text:
The chairman of the Mashantucket Pequot Tribal Council that runs Foxwoods Resort Casino on Friday said the tribe was interested in running a new Connecticut casino in cooperation with its rival, the Mohegan Tribe.

The comment from Rodney Butler, chairman of the council, came after statements earlier this week from the Mohegan Tribal Gaming Authority, which runs the Mohegan Sun, that it was interested in working with the Mashantucket...

twitter.description: As both tribes see gambling competition mounting from Massachusetts and New York, the head of the Mashantucket Pequot Tribal Council said he was interested in running a new Connecticut casino with rivals, the Mohegan Tribe.
twitter.title: Connecticut Tribes Open to Cooperation on a Casino

image.alt: The Indian tribes in Connecticut that run Foxwoods and the Mohegan Sun are open to running a casino together
